title: The joys of open borders
author: VD
content_html:
It’s wonderful how migrants are able to contribute so colorfully to the multicultural vibrancy of the community:

British girls as young as 12 are being forced into prostitution by migrants in a new crime of ‘internal’ people trafficking. Children from ordinary families are groomed by older men posing as boyfriends before being pimped around the UK to have sex up to 20 times a night.

They are raped and often drugged, according to police.

Officers have identified ‘syndicates of Iraqi men throughout the UK’ behind the exploitation. A Government report said ‘internal trafficking’ was an ’emerging issue’ and it should no longer be assumed young victims of sex exploitation were smuggled from abroad.

Culture abhors a vaccuum.
